message.body: Everseeking
Eversee King
Ever Seeking
good morning, sleepyhead...
I wish I knew php
I'm selling off my art collection to pay for a business start up.
I sold a GG though only in word, waiting on a money transfer from Australia.
(1/2) I'm trying to make sense of CMS and stuff like Joomla, but I am so frickin clueless. Makes me grumpy, disheartened and want to have the cash to just pay s
(2/2) omeone to do it.
what's the business?
i just sent a text to a buddy of mine to see if he could help you out.
(1/2) Design as always. Before I got sick I was turning out book and ebooks at a decent pace for other people. And the usual promotion stuff... business cards,
(2/2) flyers and anything in print. I moved away from web with bells on.
how much $$ do you need and what for?
(1/2) I have php and all that technical voodoo where I host my site. Joomla is already installed and I've been half assing reading tuts on it but I think I have
(2/2) IDGAF ADD
Well, its all down to if I want to pay someone to do this because in my old age my brain is fried and I just want to design, paint and diddle myself.
(1/4) I need a click a button to upload portfolio, client login access with a collab whiteboard, meeting calendar, client file upload/download/storage, invoice/
(3/4) counts if there is such a thing; then a blog function, a calendar function to display art shows, and two portfolios.. one for art and one for design. An
(4/4) d hmmm. A partridge in a pear tree.
(2/4) archive/bill pay; for the art side I need a pay per download function that I can easily configure on the fly, I need a shopping cart that can do inventory
I lie. I really just want to paint. But I have to feed my kiddo. Thus the design.

yeah. i'll ask around...
let's keep you painting and feeding kiddos.
I appreciate it.
so...how much money do you need to get started? realistically.
Minus the website, on the cheap under two grand.
On modestly outfitted, under nine grand.
And add in whatever the cost for the website should I have someone do it.
Adobe cloud has saved me loads of startup cost. I'm in love with the new monthly subscription fee. I can access all programs.
really? wow. that's fucking genius!
The bulk of the costs go to tools. On the cheap its all in the oversized scanner and a larger graphics tablet.
On moderate its scanner, printer and tablet.
On ideal it tallies about 20k
I just got a new graphics computer. It was a chunk of change.
what did you get?
We put together a killer Dell system.
I am not a mac person. My dad is.
hell yeah!
